name: rivaas.dev
description: Official landing page for Rivaas - High-performance API framework for Go

scripts.build:html: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/favicon.svg dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:static: cp src/robots.txt src/sitemap.xml src/sitemap-main.xml dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:scss && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:static
scripts.watch: npx concurrently 'npm run watch:tailwind' 'npm run watch:scss' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx concurrently 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'

author: The Rivaas Authors
